subject: do not error on invalid cookie
make DateMiddleware init private; assert on eventloop; fixes #1628
use tagged versions of websockets and http
properly set html mediatype for views
Better convert status code into HTTPResponseStatus
body:
This depends on version 1.3.0 of SwiftNIO, see: https://github.com/apple/swift-nio/pull/158

The benefit of this change is that when you have a known status code (e.g. 200) this will be converted to `HTTPResponseStatus.ok` instead of `HTTPResponseStatus.custom(200, '')`. This allows comparing the status code of the resulting `HTTPResponse` directly to a `HTTPResponseStatus` case.

subject: command config updates, moved to console. updates serve command to properly use flags
use environment for command line arguments
update test to not be dependent on key ordering
unpin deps when testing api template
conform decoding error to aborterror. fixes #1534
Check to see if path is a directory as well
remove url query when routing request, fixes #1537
use memory-threadsafe keyed cache. fixes vapor/auth#31
change logic to catch system clock change case
Shut down the application's event loop when it gets deallocated.
body: Without this, every time we initialize an `Application`, it leaks an event loop thread. This probably won't happen in production, but it might happen in tests, where each test case creates its own `Application` instance for testing.

subject: Fix usage of the updated Base64 API.
body: (This was broken since making `Data.base64Encoded()` throwing yesterday, and it's still broken after making it non-throwing again today. This fixes it once `fix-base64` is merged in `vapor-core`.)

subject: Add heroku config option to EngineServerConfig
body:
This way you can set your app up to accept the `'PORT` environment variable that Heroku requires. Config is done the same way as all the other configs.
Inside `config.swift`:
`services.use(EngineServerConfig.heroku())`

subject: Make HTTPStatus conform to ResponseEncodable
use renamed to using back since it is the best
renamed using to use for function and in-place usage
renamed methods for adding middleware to using
renamed Validator to Closure since it's no longer validate
renamed validate to beforeEach to better describe itself
refactor RoutingGroups add RoutingGroups test add PathComponent equitable functions
Unified boolValue behavior across Linux and Mac
body:
Swift 4.1 on Linux removed protocol Boolean aligning behavior with
the macOS/IOS.

subject: Add explicit type parameter to decodeJSONBody
fix all of mysql with reactiveness
Make use of Async protocol helpers
clean up redis parser using the new async protocol

Add Date range checks to the IsCount validator. Extend the IsCount validator so ranges are handled more correctly and Int and UInt ranges and values are more flexibly compared. Extend the validator to allow lexicographical comparison of strings. Add more tests for integer ranges. Credit to @twostraws for the majority of this work.
Make Date available as validation data
Trying to get the new eventloop system up
Add validation data conformance for Int8/16/32/64 and UInt8/16/32/64
Allow unsigned integer data for validation. Make IsCount() validator generic over integer range types and support uints. Add tests.
remove max: params where using buffers
move dispatch socket stream to async
Fix adding multiple services of the same type with different tags, add test for this case. Adds missing test specs in allTests for services tests.
Per issue #1345, heavily refactor `ConsoleColor` and `ConsoleStyle` to more accurately represent the color possibilities of the console and to redefine the concept of a style at a higher level.
Add support for 'bright' terminal colors (90-97 and 100-107), 'bold' terminal colors (SGR 1), and specifying background colors in a `ConsoleStyle`.
Support single value decoding in MySQL
Add query parameters and fragement to route
Explicitly define inputStream to be from Async
